729787f-a.title: Richmond: Union Avenue - Sylvan Place
729787f-a.text:
47 Union Avenue, east side, between Sylvan
Place and Forest Court. The inscription over the
doorway reads: Horse shoer and blacksmith.
Anril 23, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729787f-a.folder: Union Avenue & Sylvan Place, Staten Island, NY

729786f-a.title: Richmond: Union Avenue - Sylvan Place
729786f-a.text:
3O Union Avenue, at the N. W. corner of Sylvan
Place. The house was owned by C. Van Pelt in 1874
and by C. Hawkins in 1898 and 1907.
April 23, 1932
P. L. Sperr
NO RErRoDUCTI..S
